answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestion. Please take a look at our sticky note regarding upcoming trackers. You can find it in the MedHelp Suggestions Community or by copying and pasting the below URL:http://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/603286Thanks,MedHelp

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: how about one for diabetes.tracking time of day and glucose numbermaybe a section for foods eaten & meds takenthanks!
title: new tracker
